| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | pjop.1 | |- H e. CH |

| 3 |  | #P_pjop | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) = ( A -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) ) ) |
